com.facebook.share.widget

Class LikeView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • com.facebook.share.widget.LikeView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class LikeView
extends android.widget.FrameLayout
    This class provides the UI for displaying the Facebook Like button and its associated components.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  LikeView.AuxiliaryViewPosition

      Encapsulates the valid values for the facebook:object_type attribute for a LikeView
      static interface  LikeView.OnErrorListener
      Callback interface that will be called when a network or other error is encountered while logging in.
      static class  LikeView.Style
      Encapsulates the valid values for the facebook:style attribute for a LikeView

    • Method Detail

      • setObjectIdAndType

        public void setObjectIdAndType(java.lang.String objectId,
                      LikeView.ObjectType objectType)
        Sets the associated object ID for this LikeView. Can be changed during runtime.
        Parameters:
        objectId - The object ID, this can be a URL or a Facebook ID.

      • setLikeViewStyle

        public void setLikeViewStyle(LikeView.Style likeViewStyle)
        Sets the facebook:style for this LikeView. Can be changed during runtime.
        Parameters:
        likeViewStyle - Should be either LikeView.STANDARD, LikeView.BUTTON or LikeView.BOX_COUNT

      • setAuxiliaryViewPosition

        public void setAuxiliaryViewPosition(LikeView.AuxiliaryViewPosition auxiliaryViewPosition)
        Sets the facebook:auxiliary_view_position for this LikeView. Can be changed during runtime.
        Parameters:
        auxiliaryViewPosition - Should be either LikeView.TOP, LikeView.INLINE or LikeView.BOTTOM

      • setHorizontalAlignment

        public void setHorizontalAlignment(LikeView.HorizontalAlignment horizontalAlignment)
        Sets the facebook:horizontal_alignment for this LikeView. Can be changed during runtime.
        Parameters:
        horizontalAlignment - Should be either LikeView.LEFT, LikeView.CENTER or LikeView.RIGHT

      • setForegroundColor

        public void setForegroundColor(int foregroundColor)
        Sets the facebook:foreground_color for this LikeView. Can be changed during runtime. The color is only used for the social sentence text.
        Parameters:
        foregroundColor - And valid android.graphics.Color value.

      • setOnErrorListener

        public void setOnErrorListener(LikeView.OnErrorListener onErrorListener)
        Sets an OnErrorListener for this instance of LikeView to call into when certain exceptions occur.
        Parameters:
        onErrorListener - The listener object to set

      • getOnErrorListener

        public LikeView.OnErrorListener getOnErrorListener()
        Returns the current OnErrorListener for this instance of LikeView.
        Returns:
        The OnErrorListener

      • setFragment

        public void setFragment(android.support.v4.app.Fragment fragment)
        Sets the parent Fragment which is hosting this LikeView. This allows the LikeView to be embedded inside a Fragment, and will allow the fragment to receive the onActivityResult call rather than the Activity, upon completion of Likes from this view.
        Parameters:
        fragment - Fragment that is hosting the LikeView.

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Overrides:
        setEnabled in class android.view.View
